divs: Sighting DetailsWe were testing out google skymaps on the droids as I walked my friends out to their car. Noticed large star-like object slightly west of Polaris moving moderately fast upwards in the sky about a foot by eye. It then stopped, became slightly harder to see for a second. The object then jetted to the west at a quicker speed until it disappeared over the horizon. Total visible time about ten seconds. It did not appear to be any plane, satellite, asteroid, or artificial cloud study of any kind. Both myself and my 2 friends witnessed this ufo. We have never seen anything like this before.
Summary: Stationary star like object, slightly west of Polaris, moves upwards northbound, then jets to the west.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been no other sightings in Warsaw
This sighting has never been favorited.
